mapper.select: SELECT vc.id, vc.json, vt.id AS typeId, vt.`name` AS typeName FROM vita_chart vc JOIN vita_type vt ON vc.type_id = vt.id WHERE vc.email = #{email} AND vc.has_deleted = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE vita_chart SET has_deleted = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
